question: Based on the chart below for fitness enthusiasts, which of the following statements is true?

options.A: Intermediate level show higher fitness progress than Advanced participants under some workout frequencies.
options.B: Experience level has no impact on fitness progress regardless of workout frequency.
options.C: Advanced participants always achieve better progress than all other experience levels.
options.D: Some Beginners achieve higher fitness progress than Advanced participants despite having less experience.

explanation: The chart uses inappropriate color encoding where Beginners and Intermediates appear to represent a higher skill level than Advanced. This misleading color scheme leads viewers to assume Beginners (dark red dots) should consistently show lower progress than Advanced participants (lighter red dots).
